original: ma no ha ri s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ma no ha ri s'a dha nam /

original: de nas mi'am ci'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas mi'am ci'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the means of achieving a kinnara is explained.

original: aom ma no ha ri sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ma no ha ri sv'a h'a /

original: zhes so // sngar gyi tshogs byas pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas ri'i rtse mor stong phrag brgyad bzlas te /
analyzed: zhes so // sngar gyi tshogs byas pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas ri'i rtse mor stong phrag brgyad bzlas te /
translated: A practitioner of Yamāri who has previously performed the accumulation, having recited [the mantra] eight thousand times on a mountain peak,

original: de'i rjes la mchod pa chen po byas te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la mchod pa chen po byas te /
translated: after that, having made a great offering,

original: ba'i sha dang gu gul bsres pa'i bdug spos btang zhing /
analyzed: ba'i sha dang gu gul bsres pa'i bdug spos btang zhing /
translated: he should offer incense of cow's ghee and frankincense.

original: ji srid ma byung ba de srid gyi bar du bzlas pas de nas nam phyed kyi dus su mi 'am ci'i bu mo de rang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid ma byung ba de srid gyi bar du bzlas pas de nas nam phyed kyi dus su mi 'am ci'i bu mo de rang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as she does not come, he should recite. Then, at midnight, that kinnara maiden will come by herself.
One should not be afraid of her.

original: sgrub pa po khyed kyis bdag la bka' bsgo ba mdzad du gsol zhes zer na /
analyzed: sgrub pa po khyed kyis bdag la bka' bsgo ba mdzad du gsol zhes zer na /
translated: If she says, O practitioner, please command me,

original: bzang mo khyod bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces brjod do //
analyzed: bzang mo khyod bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces brjod do //
translated: one should say, Good woman, be my wife.

original: de nas rgyab tu khur nas lha'i 'jig rten du khyer te /
analyzed: de nas rgyab tu khur nas lha'i 'jig rten du khyer te /
translated: Then, carrying him on her back, she takes him to the world of the gods.

original: de nas yang rang gi gnas su skyel lo //
analyzed: de nas yang rang gi gnas su skyel lo //
translated: Then, she takes him back to his own place.

original: lha'i 'dod pa'i rdzas kyang ster ro //
analyzed: lha'i 'dod pa'i rdzas kyang ster ro //
translated: She also gives him divine objects of desire.

original: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Manohara is complete.
